<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Manages a Role assignment within group on HuaweiCloud IAM Service.

Note: You *must* have admin privileges in your HuaweiCloud cloud to use this resource.


<div><pulumi-examples>

## Example Usage

<div><pulumi-chooser type="language" options="typescript,python,go,csharp,java,yaml"></pulumi-chooser></div>


### Assign Role On Project Level


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using Pulumi;
using Huaweicloud = Pulumi.Huaweicloud;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var role1 = Huaweicloud.Iam.GetRole.Invoke(new()
    {
        Name = "rds_adm",
    });

    var group1 = new Huaweicloud.Iam.Group("group1");

    var roleAssignment1 = new Huaweicloud.Iam.RoleAssignment("roleAssignment1", new()
    {
        RoleId = role1.Apply(getRoleResult => getRoleResult.Id),
        GroupId = group1.Id,
        ProjectId = @var.Project_id,
    });

});
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		role1, err := Iam.GetRole(ctx, &iam.GetRoleArgs{
			Name: pulumi.StringRef("rds_adm"),
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		group1, err := Iam.NewGroup(ctx, "group1", nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = Iam.NewRoleAssignment(ctx, "roleAssignment1", &Iam.RoleAssignmentArgs{
			RoleId:    pulumi.String(role1.Id),
			GroupId:   group1.ID(),
			ProjectId: pulumi.Any(_var.Project_id),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="java">

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.IamFunctions;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.inputs.GetRoleArgs;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.Group;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.RoleAssignment;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.RoleAssignmentArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        final var role1 = IamFunctions.getRole(GetRoleArgs.builder()
            .name("rds_adm")
            .build());

        var group1 = new Group("group1");

        var roleAssignment1 = new RoleAssignment("roleAssignment1", RoleAssignmentArgs.builder()        
            .roleId(role1.applyValue(getRoleResult -> getRoleResult.id()))
            .groupId(group1.id())
            .projectId(var_.project_id())
            .build());

    }
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_huaweicloud as huaweicloud

role1 = huaweicloud.Iam.get_role(name="rds_adm")
group1 = huaweicloud.iam.Group("group1")
role_assignment1 = huaweicloud.iam.RoleAssignment("roleAssignment1",
    role_id=role1.id,
    group_id=group1.id,
    project_id=var["project_id"])
```

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as huaweicloud from "@pulumi/huaweicloud";
import * as pulumi from "@huaweicloudos/pulumi";

const role1 = huaweicloud.Iam.getRole({
    name: "rds_adm",
});
const group1 = new huaweicloud.iam.Group("group1", {});
const roleAssignment1 = new huaweicloud.iam.RoleAssignment("roleAssignment1", {
    roleId: role1.then(role1 => role1.id),
    groupId: group1.id,
    projectId: _var.project_id,
});
```

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		role1, err := Iam.GetRole(ctx, &iam.GetRoleArgs{
			Name: pulumi.StringRef("secu_admin"),
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		group1, err := Iam.NewGroup(ctx, "group1", nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = Iam.NewRoleAssignment(ctx, "roleAssignment1", &Iam.RoleAssignmentArgs{
			RoleId:   pulumi.String(role1.Id),
			GroupId:  group1.ID(),
			DomainId: pulumi.Any(_var.Domain_id),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.IamFunctions;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.inputs.GetRoleArgs;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.Group;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.RoleAssignment;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.RoleAssignmentArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        final var role1 = IamFunctions.getRole(GetRoleArgs.builder()
            .name("secu_admin")
            .build());

        var group1 = new Group("group1");

        var roleAssignment1 = new RoleAssignment("roleAssignment1", RoleAssignmentArgs.builder()        
            .roleId(role1.applyValue(getRoleResult -> getRoleResult.id()))
            .groupId(group1.id())
            .domainId(var_.domain_id())
            .build());

    }
}
```
